name: databricks-industrial-automation-suite
description: A comprehensive library designed to support all major industrial automation protocols within the Databricks ecosystem.

scripts.install:openssl: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y pkg-config libssl-dev
scripts.install:deps: source .venv/bin/activate && pip install poetry && poetry install
scripts.clean:docker: sudo docker ps -a | awk '/dias_/ {print $1}' | xargs -r sudo docker rm -f && sudo docker images | awk '/dias_/ {print $3}' | xargs -r sudo docker rmi -f

author: Irfan Ghat <irfanghat@gmail.com>
